events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your site but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been noted as a refund request for a recently purchased jacket that the customer wishes to return.
Assigning a customer service agent specialized in refunds to handle this case and assist the customer promptly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'll help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still has its original tags?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is new and has all the tags intact. I haven’t worn it at all.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days. I'll email you a prepaid return label to ship it back at no cost.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick assistance. I’ll wait for the return label and send it back right away.
The return label email has been sent. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you’ve sent the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday. I’ll wait for the refund confirmation. Thanks again for your help.
We have received the jacket and processed your refund today. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
We have sent a brief survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on your refund experience with us.
The customer completed the survey, indicating satisfaction with the refund process and overall service.
This case has been closed following successful refund issuance and positive customer feedback.
